sub_title: Brand Manager @ eBrands Global 💻 | Expertise in Amazon FBA, Bol.com, e-commerce, aggregators, & more | Project & Process Management | PM to connect ⤵
summary:
¨Where there’s a will, there’s a way.¨

In 2016, I founded The Remote Trip (www.theremotetrip.com) to bring together a like-minded community of (aspiring) remote workers to work, live, and travel around the world together. We don't run any trips anymore, however, feel free to join our worldwide remote work community for free on LinkedIn and connect with other like-minded people here: https://www.linkedin.com/groups/8737902

Since 2018, I also developed a deep interest and experience in e-commerce, in particular Amazon FBA. This led me to launch two of my own private-label Amazon FBA products in the USA, and helping other businesses to launch and grow their business on Amazon in the USA and EU. 

As the Head of Playbooks for Dwarfs.io (aggregator for Amazon/e-commerce brands), I've helped the company to grow from a team of 4 to 70 people and acquire 7 e-commerce brands in the first year. My main responsibilities were managing our team of six VA's, creating the scalable infrastructure for our Growth department by building a process- and project-oriented business, improving the company-wide way of (remote) working whilst working closely with all stakeholders of the company and CEO / CGO.

Want to get in touch? Feel free to connect + message me on LinkedIn or send an email to amyfransz@gmail.com.

Specialties:  

Amazon FBA product launches
Amazon PPC
Amazon product + keyword research 
Amazon trend analysis
Amazon / Google SEO
Amazon Brand Enhanced Content (A+ Content)
Amazon review optimization
Amazon conversion optimization
Amazon listing optimization
Amazon listing translations
Project management (ASANA)
Process management (Process.st)
VA outsourcing
Private labeling
Graphic design
Copywriting
Image and video editing
Customer service
E-commerce
Facebook Advertising
Supply chain management
Email marketing
Website design
Shopify / WordPress
(Digital) Product Creation
Lead Generation
Sales Funnel Creation
Webinar Marketing
Wordpress, HTML & CSS

authors.headline: Brand Manager @ eBrands Global 💻 | Expertise in Amazon FBA, Bol.com, e-commerce, aggregators, & more | Project & Process Management | PM to connect ⤵

profile_positions.description:
eBrands is the leading aggregator among all FBA acquirers focused on Wellness, Sustainability and social brands. As a Brand Manager, I manage five brands with my team.

My main tasks are:
- Growing my brands’ revenues and profits in accordance with eBrands’ strategy and goals
- Developing and implementing brand strategy and growth plan, including channel strategy, branding guidelines and sales and marketing plan, within the limitations of allocated budgets
- Monitoring and providing direction for product inventory, orders, and shipments for eBrands products
- Managing and optimising platform listings including content and backend optimisation. 
- Managing a team and working together, as well as with contractors and freelancers when necessary.
- Analyzing and improving product sales performance, including tasks related to advertising, product optimisation and event management, as well as brand profitability, including COGS management and cost reduction.
- Creating regular reports and analysis for business purposes as well as KPI reporting to the company leadership
- Monitoring and solving issues with product performance, rankings, ratings and customer reviews
- Training, mentoring and guiding other team members
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager

profile_positions.description: As the Head of Playbooks for Dwarfs.io (aggregator for Amazon/e-commerce brands), I've helped the company to grow from a team of 4 to 70 people and acquire 7 e-commerce brands in the first year. My main responsibilities were managing our team of six VA's, creating the scalable infrastructure for our Growth department by building a process- and project-oriented business, improving the company-wide way of (remote) working whilst working closely with all stakeholders of the company and CEO / CGO.
profile_positions.title: Head of Playbooks

profile_positions.description:
We are proud to be Europe’s no. 1 marketplace buyer! At Dwarfs, we are mining rough diamonds (successful Ecommerce brands) on different marketplaces such as Amazon, Bol.com, Cdiscount, Allegro, Real/Kaufland, ePrice, OnBuy, El Corte Ingles, CDON, and more.

💎 200%+ GROWTH year-on-year on our Ecommerce accounts
💎 45+ YEARS of Ecommerce experience in our founding team
💎 $100+ MLN SALES Ecommerce generated by our founding team
💎 LESS THAN 35 DAYS to complete selling your business
💎 ENJOY the profits of the future accelerated growth with us

We get energised by helping online entrepreneurs and brands to realise their full potential. Being entrepreneurs ourselves, we truly appreciate the heavy lifting of online entrepreneurs and to offer financial freedom with a fair exit.

👉 Find out what your business is worth, use our Free Valuation tool: dwarfs.io/get-free-valuation
profile_positions.title: Ecommerce Manager

profile_positions.description:
FordeBaker is a full-service Amazon consultancy.

Our team of Amazon consultants deliver results for consumer and B2B clients in Europe, North America and Australia. We specialise in launching brands on to Amazon, optimising existing stores and ultimately making Amazon a profitable venture for all clients.

Our services are tailored to the individual needs of each client, we can provide a full range of services to manage Amazon stores globally or clients can select specific services, such as Amazon advertising, SEO and listing optimisation.

We have a proven track record of achieving rapid growth for all types of businesses and have experience across a wide range of sectors including beauty, nutrition, clothing, pet supplies, books, office supplies and skincare.
profile_positions.title: Amazon Account Strategist

profile_positions.description:
•	Created and grown two of my own private-label Amazon FBA products
•	Managed Amazon FBA client-portfolios from atlecko.co.uk and atlecko.com for about 15 SKU´s, up to $200.000/year
•	Set up several e-commerce and Amazon FBA brands using Shopify, Woocommerce, and Facebook advertising
profile_positions.title: Amazon Marketplace Specialist / E-commerce (Remote)

profile_positions.description:
In 2016, I created The Remote Trip to bring together a like-minded community of (aspiring) remote workers to work, live, and travel around the world together. We went all around Asia and Latin America with remote employees (from Toptal, Mozilla, Aetna, Canonical, etc.), freelancers (web designers, SEO specialists, FB advertisers, writers, etc.), and entrepreneurs. 

We've also created online resources such as ebooks, courses, blogs, and expert & community support to help people start their own remote business. 

Check out our website & follow us on social media: 

Website: https://www.theremotetrip.com

instagram.com/theremotetrip

profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: 4-month assignment as a Customer Facing Specialist for the Albert Heijn account.
profile_positions.title: Customer Facing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Founded in 1929, Unilever now is the world's third-largest consumer goods company. It owns over 400 brands, and its products are available in around 190 countries. Unilever is organised into four main divisions - Foods, Refreshment (beverages and ice cream), Home Care, and Personal Care.

Responsibilities in this position include: 

•	Participated in the first pilot for the Weekend Ordering process at Unilever BeNeLux 
•	Analyzed customer demand, estimated sales volume, and created SAP overviews 
•	First point of customer contact with regard to order management
•	Trained 12 new employees 
•	Documented job tasks to facilitate knowledge transfer within the company
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Officer & Customer Service Officer

profile_positions.description:
PwC is a multinational professional services network, committed in delivering quality in Assurance, Tax & HRS and Advisory services with a network of firms in 157 countries. 

In this position I am responsible for the support of four Assurance Partners regarding project/portfolio coordination and management for their total client portfolio (around 200 clients in total).

Tasks in this position include:
•	Supported four Assurance Partners in project/portfolio management for their entire client portfolio (+/- 200 clients each)
•	Coordinated, signaled and escalated issues during the audit cycle to the partners, managers and audit teams while striving for efficiency and process control
•	Created financial/budget analyses for several clients
profile_positions.title: Consultant - Portfolio Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
HousingAnywhere.com is a startup company founded by RSM and ESADE students. This platform focuses on short-term accommodation and meeting the supply and demand of incoming and outgoing international students. 

Tasks in this position: 
•	Recruited, hired and managed a team of 15-20 students in the USA via Skype
•	Performed personal sales meetings in international conferences (NAFSA & EAIE)
•	Executed end-to-end sales tasks from first contact to customer service
•	Implemented marketing and communication strategies for customers with a specific project to work locally at the University of Southern California, Los Angeles, for five months.
profile_positions.title: Country Manager USA & Marketing Lead & Sales Agent
